verses.verse: <S%H3045>Know<s%> you the <S%H6256>time<s%> when the <S%H3277>wild<s%> <S%H3277>goats<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth?<s%> or can you <S%H8104>mark<s%> when the <S%H355>hinds<s%> do <S%H2342>calve?<s%>
Can you <S%H5608>number<s%> the <S%H3391>months<s%> that they fulfill? or <S%H3045>know<s%> you the <S%H6256>time<s%> when they <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth?<s%>
They <S%H3766>bow<s%> themselves, they <S%H6398>bring<s%> <S%H6398>forth<s%> their <S%H3206>young<s%> ones, they <S%H7971>cast<s%> out their <S%H2256>sorrows.<s%>

Their <S%H1121>young<s%> ones are in <S%H2492>good<s%> <S%H2492>liking,<s%> they <S%H7235>grow<s%> up with <S%H1250>corn;<s%> they <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> not to them.

<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> out the <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>ass<s%> <S%H2670>free?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H6605>loosed<s%> the <S%H4147>bands<s%> of the <S%H6171>wild<s%> <S%H6171>ass?<s%>
<S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> I have <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H6160>wilderness,<s%> and the <S%H4420>barren<s%> land his <S%H4908>dwellings.<s%>
He <S%H7832>scorns<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of the <S%H7151>city,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8085>regards<s%> he the <S%H8663>crying<s%> of the <S%H5065>driver.<s%>
The <S%H3491>range<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> is his <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> and he <S%H1875>searches<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3387>green<s%> thing.
Will the <S%H7214>unicorn<s%> be <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> you, or <S%H3885>abide<s%> by your <S%H18>crib?<s%>
Can you <S%H7194>bind<s%> the <S%H7214>unicorn<s%> with his <S%H5688>band<s%> in the <S%H8525>furrow?<s%> or will he <S%H7702>harrow<s%> the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you?
Will you <S%H982>trust<s%> him, <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H3581>strength<s%> is <S%H7227>great?<s%> or will you <S%H5800>leave<s%> your <S%H3018>labor<s%> to him?
Will you <S%H539>believe<s%> him, that he will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>home<s%> your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> it into your <S%H1637>barn?<s%>
Gave you the <S%H7443>goodly<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> to the <S%H7443>peacocks?<s%> or <S%H84>wings<s%> and <S%H2624>feathers<s%> to the <S%H5133>ostrich?<s%>
<S%H3588>Which<s%> <S%H5800>leaves<s%> her <S%H1000>eggs<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H2552>warms<s%> them in <S%H6083>dust,<s%>
And <S%H7911>forgets<s%> that the <S%H7272>foot<s%> may <S%H2115>crush<s%> them, or that the <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> may <S%H1758>break<s%> them.
She is <S%H7188>hardened<s%> against her <S%H1121>young<s%> ones, as though they were not her's: her <S%H3018>labor<s%> is in <S%H7385>vain<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H6343>fear;<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> has <S%H5382>deprived<s%> her of <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> has he <S%H2505>imparted<s%> to her <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
What <S%H6256>time<s%> she <S%H4754>lifts<s%> up herself on <S%H4791>high,<s%> she <S%H7832>scorns<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider.<s%>
Have you <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H1369>strength?<s%> have you <S%H3847>clothed<s%> his <S%H6677>neck<s%> with <S%H7483>thunder?<s%>
Can you make him <S%H7493>afraid<s%> as a <S%H697>grasshopper?<s%> the <S%H1935>glory<s%> of his <S%H5170>nostrils<s%> is <S%H367>terrible.<s%>
He <S%H2658>paws<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> and <S%H7797>rejoices<s%> in his <S%H3581>strength:<s%> he <S%H3318>goes<s%> on to <S%H7125>meet<s%> the <S%H5402>armed<s%> men.
He <S%H7832>mocks<s%> at <S%H6343>fear,<s%> and is not <S%H2865>affrighted;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> he <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
The <S%H827>quiver<s%> <S%H7439>rattles<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, the <S%H3851>glittering<s%> <S%H2595>spear<s%> and the <S%H3591>shield.<s%>

He <S%H1572>swallows<s%> the <S%H776>ground<s%> with <S%H7494>fierceness<s%> and <S%H7267>rage:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H539>believes<s%> he that it is the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1767>among<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> <S%H1889>Ha,<s%> <S%H1889>ha;<s%> and he <S%H7306>smells<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off, the <S%H7482>thunder<s%> of the <S%H8269>captains,<s%> and the <S%H8643>shouting.<s%>
Does the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> <S%H82>fly<s%> by your <S%H998>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H6566>stretch<s%> her <S%H3671>wings<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south?<s%>
Does the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> <S%H1361>mount<s%> up <S%H5921>at<s%> your <S%H6310>command,<s%> and make her <S%H7064>nest<s%> on <S%H7311>high?<s%>
She <S%H7931>dwells<s%> and <S%H3885>stays<s%> on the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> on the <S%H8127>crag<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and the <S%H4686>strong<s%> place.
From <S%H8033>there<s%> she <S%H2658>seeks<s%> the <S%H400>prey,<s%> and her <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5027>behold<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off.
Her <S%H667>young<s%> ones also <S%H5966>suck<s%> up <S%H1818>blood:<s%> and <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> are, <S%H8033>there<s%> is she.
